DeprecationReportBody.summary: NOTE Experimental The DeprecationReportBody interface of the Reporting API represents the body of a deprecation report.

remarks.para: A deprecation report is generated when a deprecated feature (for example a deprecated API method) is used on a document being observed by a . In addition to the support of this API, receiving useful deprecation warnings relies on browser vendors adding these warnings for deprecated features.

DeprecationReportBodyLineNumber.summary: NOTE Experimental The lineNumber read-only property of the interface returns the line in the source file in which the deprecated feature was used.

blockquote.para: This property is most useful alongside as it enables the location of the line in that file where the error occurred.

DeprecationReportBodyLineNumber.value: An integer, or null if the line is not known.

DeprecationReportBodySourceFile.summary: NOTE Experimental The sourceFile read-only property of the interface returns the path to the source file where the deprecated feature was used.

blockquote.para: This property can be used with and to locate the column and line in the file where the error occurred.

DeprecationReportBodySourceFile.value: A string, or null if the path is not known.

DeprecationReportBodyMessage.summary: NOTE Experimental The message read-only property of the interface returns a human-readable description of the deprecation. This typically matches the message a browser will display in its DevTools console regarding a deprecated feature.

DeprecationReportBodyAnticipatedRemoval.summary: NOTE Experimental The anticipatedRemoval read-only property of the interface returns the date that the browser version which removes the feature will ship. This value can be used to prioritize warnings. If this property returns null because the date is unknown, then the deprecation should be considered low priority.
DeprecationReportBodyAnticipatedRemoval.value: A object, or null if the date is not known.

DeprecationReportBodyColumnNumber.summary: NOTE Experimental The columnNumber read-only property of the interface returns the line in the source file in which the deprecated feature was used.

blockquote.para: This property is most useful alongside and as it enables the location of the column in that file and line where the error occurred.

DeprecationReportBodyColumnNumber.value: An integer, or null if the column is not known.

DeprecationReportBodyId.summary: NOTE Experimental The id read-only property of the interface returns a string representing the feature or API that is deprecated. This can be used to group or count related reports.

DeprecationReportBodyToJSON.summary: NOTE Experimental The toJSON() method of the interface is a serializer, and returns a JSON representation of the InterventionReportBody object.
DeprecationReportBodyToJSON.returns: A JSON object that is the serialization of the object.
